title: Project-Based Learning in Nursing Education Utilizing Video Conferencing Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Application of multi-point PC-based video conferencing technology in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, emphasizing clinical scenario-solving skills through learner collaboration and real-time feedback.

learning_goals: Learners participate in remote clinical scenario discussions via smartphone-based video conferencing tools with at least 80% engagement.
Learners complete at least 90% of PBL assignments based on peer assessment and feedback in a video conferencing environment.
Learners design and present a virtual team project to address community health issues by applying IP-based video conferencing technology.

resources: Free Video Conferencing Platform (Zoom/Google Meet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
